entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain or snow early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
